issue_title: [Bug] Todo id validation accepts negative and zero values, which are invalid identifiers

implementation.approach: Add validation in Todo.from_dict() to reject non-positive id values

changes_summary.source_changes: Added validation in Todo.from_dict() to check if todo_id <= 0 and raise ValueError with message "'id' must be a positive integer"
changes_summary.test_changes: Added 3 tests for id validation: test_todo_from_dict_rejects_zero_id, test_todo_from_dict_rejects_negative_id, test_todo_from_dict_accepts_positive_id. Fixed test_storage_atomicity.py to use positive ids.
